categories.name: Handcrafted Furniture
categories.description: This category includes small furniture items that are both decorative and functional. These are often made using wood and hand-painted in traditional Indian styles like Rajasthani or Madhubani.

categories.name: Traditional Wooden Toys
categories.description: These are colorful, eco-friendly toys made from wood, showcasing traditional Indian folk art. They double as collectibles or play items for children.

categories.name: Decorative Storage Containers
categories.description: Storage solutions with an artistic touch. These containers are functional yet stylish, ideal for organizing spices, tea, or knick-knacks.

categories.name: Kitchen & Serveware
categories.description: Items used for serving or displaying food and beverages, usually made of wood and decorated with ethnic art.

categories.name: Spiritual & Religious Decor
categories.description: This category includes items used for pooja, temple decor, or spiritual displays. Richly painted and sculpted, they represent deities or mythological scenes.

products.name: Elephant Shaped Wooden Stool
products.description:
Add a splash of color and culture to your living space with this beautifully handcrafted Elephant-Shaped Wooden Stool. Intricately designed and hand-painted by skilled artisans, this piece showcases traditional Indian folk art with vibrant patterns and motifs.

The stool’s structure takes the charming form of an elephant, symbolizing strength, wisdom, and prosperity in Indian culture. Whether used as a side table, a decorative accent, or a seat for kids, it stands out as a unique, multifunctional decor item.
features: Hand-painted in traditional Rajasthani folk designs
Wipe gently with a soft, dry cloth

products.name: Traditional Wooden Toys
products.description:
Delight in the charm of India's vibrant folk art through our collection of Traditional Wooden Toys. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using sustainable wood and painted with natural, non-toxic colors, these toys are not only safe and fun but also serve as beautiful cultural artifacts.

Inspired by rural life, mythological stories, and everyday transport, these toys are designed to spark imagination, storytelling, and nostalgia—making them loved by children, collectors, and decor enthusiasts alike.
features: Hand-painted using traditional Indian art forms like Pattachitra, Kondapalli, or Rajasthani folk styles
Long-lasting, sturdy build for play and decor

products.name: Decorative Storage Containers
products.description:
Discover the perfect blend of utility and artistry with our collection of Decorative Storage Containers. Handcrafted using wood or tin and embellished with vibrant hand-painted designs, these containers add a touch of ethnic charm to any space while keeping your essentials organized.

Whether you use them in the kitchen for spices, in the living room for trinkets, or as gifting jars, these containers are as beautiful as they are practical. Each piece is a testament to India's rich artisan heritage, painted with traditional floral, geometric, and folk art motifs.
features: By skilled rural artisans using eco-friendly processes

products.name: Serveware
products.description:
Reconnect with tradition through our Terracotta Kitchen & Serveware collection—handcrafted from natural clay and baked in kilns using age-old techniques. These rustic yet elegant pieces bring a warm, earthy aesthetic to your dining table, while enhancing both health and sustainability.

Each item is shaped and painted by skilled artisans, often inspired by folk patterns and natural tones. Whether you're serving water in a terracotta jug, plating up snacks in a clay bowl, or presenting a meal on a mud plate, this category blends function, culture, and eco-friendliness.
features: Ideal for dry or semi-moist foods; some items are pre-treated for water storage
Often hand-painted or etched with ethnic patterns

settings.value: Discover masterpieces created by skilled artisans who carry forward centuries-old traditions. Each piece is a testament to India's rich cultural heritage.
